article_node.title: iPhone 17 release is rumored for September: Here's what to know ahead of Apple's fall event
article_node.summary: Apple is set to unveil its iPhone 17 lineup on September 9, with rumors of an ultra‑thin iPhone 17 Air, an all‑aluminum chassis for the Pro models, and a $50 price hike to offset tariffs. Leaks suggest the Air will feature a single‑lens camera, a 2.8‑kWh battery, and a titanium frame, while the Pro models may switch from titanium to aluminum and include a full‑width camera island. The event will also likely showcase new Apple Watch models, AirPods Pro 3, and iOS 26, which introduces a Liquid Glass design and AI‑driven features such as live translation and Visual Intelligence. Analysts expect the launch to drive a modest bump in iPhone pricing and could influence secondary‑market demand for older models. The rumors are supported by MacRumors, Bloomberg, and various leakers, with a confirmed event date from German carriers.
